title: Welcome Bar
shortDescription: Display a message bar at the top of your page.
longDescription: Display a message at the top of any page that links anywhere.
author: Cloudflare Labs

products.title: Pro
products.longDescription:
- Multiple messages
- Hide the Welcome Bar after a specific date
- More themes

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

categories.title: Recommended For Stores
categories.description: Apps for stores in the recommendation engine.

enumNames.multiple: A random message from a set

buttonColorHelp.helpvalue: Note: Buttons will appear as text in the Message text color on mobile devices.

versions.releaseNotes:
- Added support for multiple messages
- Added "Hide by this date" option
- Added 1 week expiration when visitor hides message.
- Fixed issue where message newlines were not inserted
- **Moved slim theme to "Pro" plan.**

versions.releaseNotes:
- Added support for multiple messages
- Added "Hide by this date" option
- Added 1 week expiration when visitor hides message
- Fixed issue where message newlines were not inserted
- Fixed issue where preview does show closed message update for color changes

The following features have been moved to the "Pro" plan. 
- Slim theme
- Automatically dismiss after a few seconds
